text: This is a list of airports in Kuwait, sorted by location. __TOC__ == Airports == Airport names shown in bold indicate the airport has scheduled service on commercial airlines. {| class="wikitable sortable" |- valign=baseline ! style="text-align:left;" | City served ! style="text-align:left;" | ICAO ! style="text-align:left;" | IATA ! style="text-align:left;" | Airport name ! style="text-align:left;" | Coordinates |- style="font-weight:bold; background:#CCCCCC;" | Civil airports | | | | |- valign=top | Kuwait City | OKBK | KWI | Kuwait International Airport | |- style="font-weight:bold; background:#CCCCCC;" | Military airports | | | | |- valign=top | Kuwait | OKAJ | | Ahmad al-Jaber Air Base | |- valign=top | Kuwait | OKAS | | Ali Al Salem Air Base | |- valign=top | Kuwait | OKDI | | Udairi Army Airfield (Camp Buehring) | |} == See also == * Transport in Kuwait * List of airports by ICAO code: O#OK - Kuwait * Wikipedia:WikiProject Aviation/Airline destination lists: Asia#Kuwait == References == * * – includes IATA codes * Great Circle Mapper: Airports in Kuwait – IATA and ICAO codes, coordinates * World Aero Data: Kuwait – ICAO codes and coordinates == External links == Kuwait Airports Airports Kuwait
